title: Bombtrack at the NRW-Cross-Cup
content:
In 2017 Bombtrack teamed up with the cycling association NRW and combined various Cyclocross races to a local, small Cyclocross Cup: the “BOMBTRACK NRW-CROSS-CUP”. A regional series, with its races all being held in the state of “North Rhine Westphalia”.

Going in it’s sixth round in 24/25, those cover every racing category from kids to seniors, from hobby to elite. There’s a small pot of prize money, so the fastest riders get their travel costs covered. Each race has a completely unique, creative course and whilst they all offer a competitive aspect it might be the general focus on fun that helps to attract the large number of recurring starters…
